summary: A retexture of Ulfrik Stormcloaks clothes...
descriptionHtml:
The Elder Scrolls V
     Skyrim 

Ulfrik the colorful v1.0
(Ulfrik Stormcloak retexture)

[color=red]Nexus Modmanager supported![/color]

by: Mighty (see readme)




Description:

-------------------------------------------------------------------

A retexture of Ulfrik Stormcloaks clothes, nuffsaid.

If like to add them per console, these are the itemcodes:
00062303, 0006230B, 00062311

-------------------------------------------------------------------






1. Installation:

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Extract this archive into the \"Skyrim/Data\" folder

Example of what it should look like, 

\"C:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\" 

may be different depending where you installed it.



-------------------------------------------------------------------








2. ???

-------------------------------------------------------------------








3. Profit!

-------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Mighty
